title: Indianapolis Conference to focus on Healthcare Mergers Acquisitions Partnerships
text:
(MENAFN Press) Indianapolis IN August 3 2015 – The International Institute for Business Information & Growth (iiBIG) along with Platinum sponsor PricewaterhouseCoopers (PwC) presents its 8th annual fall "Investment and M&A Opportunities in HEALTHCARE conference to be held in Indianapolis November 5-6th. Registration is now open and early-bird registration discounts are in effect until August 31st.
See conference website at: 
To register click on the REGISTER NOW tab on the event webiste (above)
The headlines continue to announce more and more M&A and partnership activity in the healthcare space.  Healthcare-related deal-flow at both the mega-deal level as well as in the middle-markets continues to lead almost all other sectors. All of these issues will be the focus of iiBIG's fall "Investment and M&A Opportunities in HEALTHCARE” conference in Indianapolis November 5-6th. 
For example on the mega-deal side Indianapolis-based Eli Lilly recently announced plans to significantly increase its footprint in the San Diego biotech corridor; Teva announced plans to acquire Allergan's generic drug division; Anthem strikes a deal for Cigna; and Pfizer and AbbVie continue to stalk deals. In the middle-markets hospital/hospital mergers and hospital acquisitions of physician practices are robust; and healthcare products and services companies are pursuing growth-through-acquisition and tuck-in strategies in record numbers.  Perhaps one of the most interesting the phenomenon of payer/provider convergence is becoming more widespread as cost-containment continues to be a major deal-driver.
Indianapolis home to a high concentration of healthcare-related businesses is becoming recognized as one of the nation's leading healthcare hubs.  Moreover Indianapolis has been the center of some of the most active and interesting M&A deal-flow in recent months. Key participants in many of these trends and transactions will be on hand to share insights and hard-won experiences. Whether leading the way in payer-provider convergence or generating deal-flow in the medical device pharmaceutical and animal health sectors Indianapolis is the place where healthcare entrepreneurs investors and deal-makers will meet on November 5th & 6th. To insure your place at this event please go to: REGISTER TODAY.
           
JOIN OUR FACULTY...iiBIG is assembling a speaking faculty of over 30 leading healthcare experts investment professionals and M&A deal-makers who will bring years of experience expertise and insight to the discussions about how companies are growing through acquisition and partnership strategies -- and whose predictions about where the best opportunities will be found in 2016 and beyond will be of great interest. Those interested in representing their healthcare investment or transactions services organizations on the speaking faculty are encouraged to complete the online application at: JOIN OUR FACULTY where topic preferences may be indicated. Go to conference website () and click on the JOIN OUR FACULTY tab.
To learn more about the issues to be covered please go to our conference website at: www.iibig.com/HCIndianapolis.
